storyInfo: After causing an explosion in the city, Exusiai enters a confessional and corroborates the strangeness pervading Laterano, as well as the conspiracy to blow up the Shrine of Nurtury and stop the final, most important event of the Summit of Nationsâ€”the Nativity.

attributes.content: Have you checked all the intersections?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yes, Your Eminence. We didn't find any suspicious individuals.
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: We also interviewed potential witnesses nearby, but at this time we have no concrete leads.
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: Mushrooms might spring up on a wet pillar by themselves, but bombs don't, do they?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Huh... how could they?
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: With the exception of public officers of the Curia and the Shrine of Nurtury, anyone who is in possession of explosives is subject to surveillance by the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: It's been years since an unplanned gunshot last rang out in Laterano, never mind an explosion.
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: Lemuen bends down and retrieves a bomb fragment from the damaged pillar.
It's pretty sophisticated. If a bomb like this was filled with standard explosives, the blast would have damaged far more than just one pillar.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Do you mean it was homemade? But why? A practical joke?
attributes.name: Seventh Tribunal Investigator

attributes.content: The Lateran Arms Control List was compiled by the Curia's extremely experienced explosives experts. Pretty much anything that could possibly cause a good-sized explosion is on there.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It would take considerable effort to assemble a bomb like this using materials not on the list. No one would do this for a whimsical practical joke.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Besides, today is no ordinary occasion. The second Summit of Nations is underway.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen recalls the streak of red. She feels a bit of unease, and even more perplexity.
Get me the files on recent movements around Via Jovita... correction, all of Pagus Stevonus.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What's is it?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Files that are clearly relevant to the case at hand should have been retrieved the moment we received our orders.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: There you are!
(Pats chest) *pant*... *pant*...
Forgive me, Cardinal Lemuen. Here are the files you requested.
My name is Amos, I'm an investigator with the Seventh Tribunal. I will be serving as your aide and conclavist.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: You're late, Amos.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Patrizion said you'd be here approximately ten minutes after I arrived at the scene. Here we are, thirty minutes later.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'm so sorry, I was preparing refreshments for the welcome ceremony. I didn't think it would be so urgent...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: (Shhhâ€”)
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I assume you've heard about me, if the Seventh Tribunal appointed you as my aide.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: L-Lemuen the Silent...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I tolerate no excuses.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Want some ice cream, Federico? This one's on me.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I am not in the habit of enjoying dessert in the middle of a mission.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Besides, I already partook before leaving the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So it was you who took the last cup from the lounge...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How about you tell me why you rushed out of the Notarial Hall in such a hurry? Reward for me solving that case, so to speak.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You've been standing at this intersection for ten minutes, but there's nothing here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I am under no obligation to share my private affairs with colleagues.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You said you were in the middle of a mission...
attributes.name: Richele
Richele
attributes.content: What's that sound...?

attributes.name: Richele
attributes.content: Ohâ€”you were waiting for a confessional!
attributes.joined: What's that sound...?Ohâ€”you were waiting for a confessional!

attributes.content: You've certainly accumulated your fair share of 'sins' as the executor with the highest rate of complaints at the Notarial Hall, but it's still a huge surprise to see you proactively seeking confession.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I expensed the cost of a City of Gold Blind Box on that field mission to Sargon, which resulted in my reimbursements being twice as much as what was actually spent on mission costs...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I went out my door with shame weighing on my heart... and spotted a confessional driving by... Anyway, long story short, I got myself an annual pass. You can borrow it.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Arrival announcement.
attributes.name: Mechanical Announcement

attributes.content: Automated Confessional ELCARO-001 is arriving at this station. Please line up to enjoy confessional services.
attributes.name: Mechanical Announcement

attributes.content: 'May all who are lost find salvation.'
attributes.name: Mechanical Announcement

attributes.content: The confessional enters their view, and Federico reaches out.
Hahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Even a robot knows you don't have any emotional needs, Federico.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Virtually every Lateran comes into contact with confessionals in the course of their everyday lives. In a way, these machines hold more diverse and comprehensive data than that stored in the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: They form natural archives, revealing abnormalities.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...I have arrived at certain conclusions.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hm... one second, Federico. You don't have to share your conclusions, but could you at least explain what you're looking for?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Self-reflection is part of the daily studies of the faithful. As an extension of the Church, there are almost as many confessionals in the Holy City as there are dessert carts.
These mobile public facilities roam the streets and alleys of Laterano, ensuring that citizens' emotional relief is always immediately available.
In the tiny, private space, among the holy sculptures, guns, and pleasant music, a penitent may spill their guts to the electronic confessor.
Sins could range from the shame of consuming too much sugar, to the crime of betraying one's kin or bringing harm to one's people.
After rejecting Federico, the automated confessional ELCARO-001 stops in an alley, opening its door to allow a mysterious guest to enter.
You were the one who told me to be careful.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I made sure I didn't have a tail on my butt, and you didn't give that stone-faced guy a chance to fiddle with anything.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'He may have observed something abnormal about me.'

attributes.content: Let's pray he doesn't catch you and tear you apart, piece-by-piece.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What's is it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Of course I did. A Penguin Logistics uniform is way too conspicuous for Laterano.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I designed this outfit myself. I've only worn it once, at my graduation!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And it's YOU we should be talking about. Do you know how weird it is to hear your voice come out of a confessional's speakers?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I hate to admit it... but yes.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It took so much effort to find the replacement materialsâ€”the market, the bakery, the playground, the school's secret shop... I went through every single source I could think of.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And it didn't even blast the pillar in two! Any material that's even halfway decent is restricted, and no one could give an answer when I asked why.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's not because of this 'Summit of Nations', right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If anyone in Laterano thought the beautiful sight and sound of an explosion would be any threat to the Summit of Nations, then it's not me with the problem, it's Laterano!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: As for the Summit of Nations... they just announced the final event of the whole dealâ€”some 'Nativity' ceremony in that shrine.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Are you telling me they built a building big enough to be seen from any corner of Laterano, not as a dessert museum, but to put on some kind of LIVE BIRTHING SHOW?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'You have corroborated the anomaly of your home with your own eyes, as you had hoped.'
'As you can see, this is not the Laterano you know.'

attributes.content: It's not like I could just trust you blindly. You're just an 'electronic confessor', after all.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But now, I believe you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's something REALLY wrong with Laterano. And the worst part is, nobody thinks anything's wrong at all!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'The shrine, and the ceremony. If all the anomalies are centered around the two of them...'

attributes.content: Then it's on us to bomb them, isn't it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If I figured out how to blow up a shrine that big using only common household items, shouldn't every university in Laterano give me a lifetime achievement award?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.text: 'As long as you reawaken their love of explosions.'

attributes.content: Can you believe it? The Laterans need someone to remind them that they love explosions? Sounds like a nightmare, doesn't it? Shouldn't take more than an afternoon at the Firearms Workshop to do the job.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh yeah! The Firearms Workshop! The workshops may be closed, but the people are still around!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I know what you're gonna say. It's too dangerous. Firearms Workshop is the first place they would look if anything happened, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll be careful. You do the same, and don't get yourself taken apart. That's my job, once this is all over and done with.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Anyway... Welcome to Laterano!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My investigation is now concluded. Thank you all for your contributions.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We can go back to the Seventh Tribunal once we've signed off on the paperwork. If the refreshments at the welcome ceremony haven't gone stale yet, may I count on your assistance in eliminating them with extreme prejudice?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I would like you to accompany me to see the gun-knights, Amos.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: If by 'gun-knights' you mean Reverend Patrizion, I... I'll ask Joshua to accompany you.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Explain.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: There was an incident a decade ago, when a nomadic abbey was escorting prisoners back to Laterano. A terrible fight broke out between a gun-knight and her cohort...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: By the time the Curia sent someone, much blood had been spilled, and the gun-knight had fallen.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: She was exiled from Laterano and has not been heard from since.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I've heard of the case.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That gun-knight was my wife. It was Reverend Patrizion who led the clean-up task force and exiled her.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: You've been with the Seventh Tribunal far longer than I have, Conclavist Amos. I don't need to remind you of our duty, and the duty of the gun-knightsâ€”
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No, no, you misunderstand.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: My wife was entirely at fault.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Any Sankta who raises their patron firearm against one of their own must be judged by the Law and be expelled from Paradise.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I am in no position to criticize Reverend Gun-Knight Patrizion... however, I can't bring myself to see him like this either.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Is this how you've handled any previous dealings with the gun-knights?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I... yes. I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I-I'm very sorry. Give me five minutes, I'll try to collect myself, and maybe I can go with you...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I don't mean to reprimand you. I just think that this is part of what we do at the Seventh Tribunal.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We spend our time seeing people we don't want to see, and not seeing the people we want to see. Or worseâ€”seeing the people we want to see in the worst ways possible.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I hated handing down instructions to Mostima and the others.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But they said you volunteered to join the Seventh Tribunal...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Because there's a lot I can do here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The same goes for you, Amos.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Thank you. But I don't really have aspirations. It was like that when my wife was around, and even more so after she left...
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: There's a lot at the Seventh Tribunal that needs doing. For example, there are still several Firearms Workshops that need attention.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's our first priority right now. The seizure of the Firearms Workshops must proceed without a hitch in order to prevent any more explosions.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'll leave it to you. Be quick, won't you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Are you tired?
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: You've gone through six rows of wheat with your sickle since dawn. Perhaps you should take a break by the haystacks.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Arturia.
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: I'm not so frail. Besides...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Besides?
attributes.name: Busy Nun

attributes.content: Nothing. I just wanted to see where the fields end.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I can't make out the boundary. Even my music can't penetrate it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You'll have to work harder!
We meet again, Sister Hildegard.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Arturia.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I brought your lunchâ€”bread, some ice cream crackers, and a large mug of craft beer!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Thank you. Work harder, you said?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What I mean is, there's plenty for us to do.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Look at the golden stalks, the undulating waves of wheat... it's another bumper harvest in Laterano.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Setting aside our own food stocks, Landen Monastery will be able to put twice as much grain as usual into cystymilk bread and craft beer this year. It'll be a good source of income!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Why are you laughing?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The way you talk about life makes me appreciate this prison even more, Sister Hildegard.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The respect you show for this prison makes me appreciate you even more, Arturia.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I'm very curious about your transgression. I heard the other nuns saying that your music is beautiful, but dangerous.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, Landen Monastery was founded to protect the Pope and important clerics of the Lateran Church...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Which makes me wonder when this place became a prison.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Is it not protecting... er, important clerics and the peace of Laterano, to put certain individuals of note under observation?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The significance of Landen Monastery has never changed.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Besides, the more important the monastery is to the Holy City, the less likely we will fall insolvent.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: How did you acclimate to this place so quickly as a Liberi?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I grew up here.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh, I almost forgot. This is what you requested yesterday.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Gratias.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What made you want to read The Saints' Travels all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Arturia gazes into the distance.
Behind her, the worn image of the monastery; before her, a golden sea of wheat. The wheat field runs to the edge of the Holy City, and seems to extend infinitely into the distance.
The breeze blowing through the wheat makes nary a sound. Laterano seems to slumber.
Penance, of course. What other reason might a prisoner have?
attributes.name: Arturia
